name: Doom Clash
description:
[Doom Clash] is a real-time strategy and tower defense game. Join players from around the world to build shelters, train soldiers, and recruit heroes! Devise strategies on the fly and slay the zombie horde with your ultimate doomsday army!

Game Features:

1. Experience Epic RTS Tower Defense Battles
Discover abandoned areas, rescue helpless civilians, and engage in thrilling battles. Ride in various vehicles and experience unprecedented gameplay like no other!

2. Deploy Troops in Real-Time Battles
Form powerful squads with the various weapons and troop types, and experience the thrill of a real-time strategy game!

3. Build Your Ultimate Shelter
Construct buildings automatically with the smart Manager feature. Operate the ultimate shelter with other survivors and earn money through trading. Immerse yourself in a brutal post-apocalyptic world with stunning 3D graphics!

4. Recruit Heroes to Your Cause
Heroes with unique talents have appeared in the post-apocalyptic world. Come up with various combinations and deal a massive blow to those zombies!

5. Engage in Real-Time PVP
In a post-apocalyptic world, only the fittest survive. Command your troops in real-time and experience unparalleled PvP gameplay!

6. Fight the Endless Zombie Horde
Construct defensive towers and research mutated zombies to come up with the best defensive strategy! Feel the thrill of survival as thousands of zombies attack your city!
